page.title: 19ROCKLEY OLD HALL
page.content: {Rockley Old Hall}Stands close to the Southern end of Worsbrough Reservoir,in the valley below Worsbrough Village.It was the site of the home of the{Rockley family}from the time of the Conquest until about 1280 whwn it was lost by marriage to the{Everingham}family.The present Hall is an Elizabethan building which has been added to at different times in its long life. Until recently the building was used as a farm and became quite derelict.A few years ago major reconstruction took place and the building was converted into a small number of luxury dwellings.One of the first of the new occupants was{Jackie Charlton former Leeds United and England footballer.Living there at the moment is{Kathy Staff}the actress who plays Nora Batty in Last of The Summer Wine.
